mapper.select: SELECT b.bookMarkReviewId, b.bookMarkReviewDate, r.reviewNoteTitle, b.reviewNoteId, r.reviewNoteId, r.reviewPageViewState, b.userId fROM bookmarkReview b, reviewNote r WHERE b.reviewNoteId = r.reviewNoteId AND b.userId=#{userId} and r.reviewPageViewState != "DELETE" ORDER BY b.reviewNoteId
